manipulations.style_material_change: Change the color and texture of the paddleboard on the left to resemble dark wood.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a clear reflection of the man in the black tank top to the water beneath him.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Change the sky to a dramatic sunset, casting warm orange light on the water and the men.
manipulations.insert_object: Insert a small, realistic dolphin leaping out of the water to the right of the paddle boarders.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the bridge and the trees in the background of the image.
